name: GitHub
description: Manage issues, pull requests, repositories, and more on GitHub

env.name: GitHub Personal Access Token
env.description: GitHub Personal Access Token used to authenticate with the GitHub API. Required for all GitHub operations.

env.name: Toolsets
env.description: Comma-separated list of enabled GitHub toolsets (e.g. repos,issues,pull_requests,code_security,experiments,all). Optional, defaults to all.

env.name: Dynamic Toolsets
env.description: Set to 1 to enable dynamic tool discovery. Optional.

env.name: GitHub Enterprise Host
env.description: GitHub Enterprise Server hostname (e.g. https://ghes.example.com). Optional, for GitHub Enterprise integration.
